软件包   类  使用  树  已过时  索引  帮助 
 上一个类   下一个类 框架    无框架    
摘要： 嵌套 | 字段 | 构造函数 | 方法 详细信息： 字段 | 构造函数 | 方法

elegate.nju.edu.cn
类 BinTree

java.lang.Object
  elegate.nju.edu.cn.BinTree

public class BinTree
extends java.lang.Object

class to implement a binary tree

作者：
Elegate, cs department of NJU

字段摘要
private  BinNode current
          for search or remove or add operation
private  BinNode parent
          current's parent,for search or remove or add operation
private  BinNode root
          the root of the tree
private  int size
          the number of nodes in the tree
 
构造函数摘要
BinTree()
          default constructor
BinTree(BinNode root)
          constructor with an argument
 
方法摘要
 BinNode find(BinNode node)
          find the specific node in the tree
 BinNode getRoot()
          get the root of the tree
 void inorderTraversal()
          inorder traversal method,and print the data to System.out
 void inorderTraversal(BinNode node, java.util.ArrayList arrLst)
          inorder traversal method,return the data in the second argument arrLst
 void insertNode(BinNode node)
          insert a node into the tree the right child node is larger than the farther node while the left child node is not larger than the farther node
static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
           
 BinNode max(BinNode node)
          get the maximum data of the tree with the argument as its root
 BinNode min(BinNode node)
          get the minimum data of the tree with the argument as its root

          postorder traversal method,and print the data to System.out

          postorder traversal method,return the data in the second argument arrLst

          preorder traversal method,and print the data to System.out

          preorder traversal method,return the data in the second argument arrLst

          remove a node from the tree

构造函数详细信息

BinTree

public BinTree()
default constructor

BinTree

public BinTree(BinNode root)
constructor with an argument

参数：
root - the root of a tree
方法详细信息

insertNode

public void insertNode(BinNode node)
insert a node into the tree the right child node is larger than the farther node while the left child node is not larger than the farther node

参数：
node - the new node

removeNode

public boolean removeNode(BinNode node)
remove a node from the tree

参数：
node - the node to be removed
返回：
return true if succeed,return false otherwise

min

public BinNode min(BinNode node)
get the minimum data of the tree with the argument as its root

参数：
node - the root
返回：
the node with the minimum data

max

public BinNode max(BinNode node)
get the maximum data of the tree with the argument as its root

参数：
node - the root
返回：
the node with the maximum data

find

public BinNode find(BinNode node)
find the specific node in the tree

参数：
node - the node with the value to find
返回：
the node which match the specific argument

size

public int size()
get the number of nodes in the tree

返回：
the number of nodes in the tree

inorderTraversal

public void inorderTraversal()
inorder traversal method,and print the data to System.out

inorderTraversal

public void inorderTraversal(BinNode node,
                             java.util.ArrayList arrLst)
inorder traversal method,return the data in the second argument arrLst

参数：
node - the root node
arrLst - the ArrayList to save all the data in the tree

preorderTraversal

public void preorderTraversal()
preorder traversal method,and print the data to System.out

preorderTraversal

public void preorderTraversal(BinNode node,
                              java.util.ArrayList arrLst)
preorder traversal method,return the data in the second argument arrLst

参数：
node - the root node
arrLst - the ArrayList to save all the data in the tree

postorderTraversal

public void postorderTraversal()
postorder traversal method,and print the data to System.out

postorderTraversal

public void postorderTraversal(BinNode node,
                               java.util.ArrayList arrLst)
postorder traversal method,return the data in the second argument arrLst

参数：
node - the root node
arrLst - the ArrayList to save all the data in the tree

getRoot

public final BinNode getRoot()
get the root of the tree

返回：
the root
